tool.name: Disruptin Finder
tool.description: finds proteins with size and charge criteria
tool.help:
**What it does** Finds: * Proteins with * net charge greater than the threshold * length less than the threshold and returns those in both a fasta and tabular format including name of the gene, the net charge, length, total charged residues, and the charge to size ratio for each product.
Example Output: Gene Name Net Charge Length Number of Charged Residues Charge to Size Ratio F402_gp28 7 56 15 0.268
